description: I am a passionate student, dedicated Programmer, innovative Web Developer, creative Flutter Developer, and curious Data Science enthusiast. I love solving real-world problems through efficient code, building responsive web applications, crafting cross-platform mobile apps with seamless UI/UX, and uncovering insights from data using machine learning. With a drive to learn and innovate, I continuously explore AI, Big Data, and cutting-edge technologies to create impactful solutions. My mission is to turn ideas into technology that inspires, empowers, and makes a difference.

skill.title: Web Development
skill.description: Designing and developing responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks, with focus on user experience and performance.

experience.title: Lysa Solutions (Internship)
experience.description: As a Python Developer Intern at Lysa Solutions, Developed an automated tool to extract content from previous year question papers using Python libraries, YOLO for diagram detection and the Gemini AI API for content analysis and decision-making.

experience.title: Collab Junction (Internship)
experience.description: As a Data Analyst Intern at Collab Junction, Conducted in-depth analyses of geographic data to understand university student's mindsets and event interests, creating detailed reports and visualizations to communicate actionable insights and drive strategic decisions
